Peach Tree Rascals puts his arms out, as he flows with the crowd during 2022 Governors Ball Music Festival at Citi Field on June 11, 2022 in New York City. 
Getty Images for Governors Ball

articles.author: Caroline Frost
articles.title: Billie Eilish Forced To Pause London Concert After Fans Suffer In Heat - Deadline
articles.description: Billie Eilish was forced to put her concert on pause on Saturday evening after fans got into difficulties at London’s O2 arena. Hot temperatures inside the auditorium meant some fans risked becoming squashed and overwhelmed, something the American singer spot…
articles.content:

articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: John Cena meets Ukraine war refugee with Down syndrome after teen's mom used his idol as motivation to escape - Fox News
articles.description: Famed WWE star John Cena paid a special visit to a Ukrainian teenager and his mother, who used the idea of meeting the wrestler as a motivation to flee Ukraine.
articles.content:
A Ukrainian teenager met with his idol, famed WWE star and actor John Cena, this weekend after his mother used a fantasy of meeting him as a motivational tool to flee the war-torn town of Mariupol.

articles.title: James Beard Awards 2022: Media Award Winners - Eater
articles.description: The James Beard Foundation honored cookbooks, broadcast media, and journalism after a two-year hiatus for the James Beard Foundation Media Awards
